channel.title: This might work
channel.description:
I was thinking last night, sometimes when you get the attack option in a POH, it sometimes carries over to the outside world (although you cannot actually attack anyone). Someone should try to get the option, go to Varrock, and use the attack option on the dummies...It might work ;D :P :rolleyes:
Anyways, I dunno, Im sick right now so I think of random things and I thought I would share my idea, and hey, if it works it is free exp!!!! :) :D :) :D

item.title: This might work
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Oh lol. Im not thinking straight sorry. Im really sick.

Read full topic

item.title: This might work
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

It’s been fixed ?

And you have the attack option on dummies regardless. And you can only attack dummies if you’re a low level…I think.

Read full topic
